{% extends "base_livecode.html" %} {% block title %}Lambda-Calculus{% endblock %} {% block content %}

Lambda-Calculus

zero = lambda s.lambda z.z; one = lambda s.lambda z.s z; two = lambda s.lambda z.s (s z); three = lambda s.lambda z.s (s (s z)); succ = lambda n.lambda s.lambda z.s (n s z); plus = lambda n.lambda m.lambda s.lambda z.n s (m s z); times = lambda n.lambda m.lambda s.lambda z.n (m s) z; true = lambda x.lambda y.x; false = lambda x.lambda y.y; if = lambda p.lambda a.lambda b.p a b; pair = lambda x.lambda y.lambda f.f x y; fst = lambda p.p true; snd = lambda p.p false; pred = lambda n.fst (n (lambda p.pair (snd p) (succ (snd p))) (pair zero zero)); pred three; iszero = lambda n.n (lambda x.false) true;
order full; trace on; plus two three; trace off;
{% endblock %}
